short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pluck is a helpful app that uses computer vision to provide habit-breaking realtime feedback for people with trichotillomania.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Pluck, a friendly and supportive Chrome extension designed to help people with Trichotillomania (hair-pulling disorder) become more aware of their habits and take positive steps toward healing. By using computer vision, Pluck detects when you might be pulling your eyelashes, eyebrows, or scalp hair, giving you real-time feedback so you can catch yourself before it happens. Awareness is the first step to healing, and with Pluck, you can start to understand your triggers and make small changes that add up to big progress.

Pluck also includes a fun and motivating dashboard where you can track your personal progress. See your statistics, celebrate your streaks, and set daily goals to help you stay on track. It’s a simple way to build better habits and keep improving every day.

And you’re not alone! Pluck connects you with a supportive community of people who understand exactly what you're going through. You can chat with others, share tips, and encourage each other on your journey. With Pluck, you’ll have the tools, support, and motivation to keep moving forward—one step at a time.
